Key Match Events: The game went into overtime with the Lakers winning after a tiebreaker; Dalton Knecht made key three-pointers in overtime; Suns failed to score in the last regulation opportunity
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Mike Budenholzer emphasized the importance of preseason games and preparation; LeBron James was rested for the Lakers
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Budenholzer discussed the game's outcome and the team's progress; Lakers' Anthony Davis and Dalton Knecht led the scoring
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the Suns' last preseason game before the regular season; the Suns will face the Los Angeles Clippers next
